categories

  • analysis A broad review of a work or several works on a similar concept
  • concept An widely encompassing note focusing on a topic, not a body of work (references are supplemental, not the topic at hand)
  • definition A simple term with a definition
  • found A direct quote or any work by someone else that I have not added to or changed.
  • journal Personal musings.
  • list A list of notes with something in common (example - a chapter-by-chapter review or analysis of a novel)
  • reference A citation to be placed in other notes
